Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Download it today to get the newest features and bug fixes:

We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Update to the latest version for the best possible Mozilla VPN experience. This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements.
